numerical.interpolation

Class PchipInterpolator

  • java.lang.Object
    • numerical.interpolation.PchipInterpolator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Interpolator

    public class PchipInterpolator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Interpolator
    This class aims to implement the shape-preserving cubic Hermite interpolant heavily inspired by the MATLAB implemented function 'pchip' (for more information refer to: https://www.mathworks.com/moler/interp.pdf) enforced by the Interpolator interface (through the interpolate method) which will then return a PolynomialSplineFunction class type.
